saving.text: Graphite Writer had trouble saving this document. Please check your internet connection.
saving.title: ERROR SAVING

savingSize.text: Because Graphite Writer is a free service, we limit our document sizes to 3mb in order to ensure room for everyone.
savingSize.title: ERROR SAVING

signin.text: Error signing in with Google. Please make sure that you have external scripts, cookies, and redirects enabled.

errorNoAccess: You are not authorized to view this document.

feature.support: The accuracy of these translations can not be confirmed. If you see an issue or want to help please email support
feature.supports: Graphite Writer now supports multiple languages!
feature.translate: Because Graphite Writer is a free an open source project we are using Google Translate to support non English languages.
feature.useBox: Use the selection box below to change your preferred language

footer.freeAndOpenSource: Graphite Writer is a free and open source project developed by

ifThisProblemPersists: If this problem persists please contact support
linkDesc: A view only shared document has been created. Anyone with that link can view your document. Click the link to copy it

login.instructions: Please login with Google to continue.
login.title: Welcome To Graphite Writer

noDocsDesc: You don't have any documents yet. Press new on the top right of your screen to create one.
serverConErrorDesc: Graphite Writer is having trouble connecting to its server.

collections.instructions: Right click on a document and select edit tags to create your first collection
collections.about: Collections can be used to sort your documents. Think of them as smart folders
collections.dontNeed: Don't need collections? Turn them off in
collections.used: Tags are used to automatically organize your documents into collections.
collections.onlyUse: Please only use letters, numbers, and spaces. Hit enter to add tag

collectionsOnboard.title: Collections!
collectionsOnboard.thinkOf: Think of collections as "smart folders." Collections automatically create folders based upon tags you create.
collectionsOnboard.allows: This allows you to sort your documents with any characteristics you define.
collectionsOnboard.getStarted: To get started, right click on one of your documents and select edit tags.
